reviewText: Deepa Mehta is a true revolutionary genius.  Fire and Water, profoundly outstanding!
One of the DVDs did not have subtitles.
The film was not in English and the DVD set did not have subtitles.

I already had a copy of Water (saw it on TV and wanted to see it again).  I have seen only part of Fire, and have yet to watch the third film.
Water is very special!!!
